e="preserve">Burkhard Driest (28 April 1939 — 28 February 2020) was a German actor, writer and director. He was perhaps best known for his acting work in Sam Peckinpah's "Cross of Iron" and Rainer Werner Fassbinder's "Querelle". He was born in Stettin.
Driest died on 28 February 2020 in Berlin of a long-illness, aged 80.
